description: Validation utilities for Tic Tac Toe actions, including a function to validate move indices and game state before applying a move.

methods.name: export function guardMove(board: Board, index: number, status: "playing" | "won" | "draw"): void/ guardMove
methods.description: Validates a move index and current game state before applying the move. Throws an error if the move is invalid or the game is not in a playable state.

ctags.name: guardMove
ctags.pattern: /^export function guardMove(board: Board, index: number, status: "playing" | "won" | "draw"): void/
